text:
Using the sum of two angles to find the value of n- Online Math Tutor

\mathbf{K}^{\mathbf{E}} \mathbf{L}^{\mathbf{T}_{F}}\left[\begin{array}{c}\n\angle \mathrm{ABE}=2 \mathrm{n}+7 \\\n\angle \mathrm{EBF}=4 \mathrm{n}-13\n\end{array}\right.[imath]\angle \mathrm{ABE}=2 \mathrm{n}+7 [/imath] [imath]\angle \mathrm{EBF}=4 \mathrm{n}-13[/imath]
